creator: ik@yourserveradmin.com
text:
Tomcat 5.x is looking for log4j.properties config file in many places, like 
$CATALINA_HOME/common/classes, $CATALINA_BASE/common/classes, webapps.

Seems Tomcat 6 is looking for the config in $CATALINA_HOME/lib folder only. 
Therefore, there is no way to get several tomcat instances running on the same 
box, which use different log4j settings.

Thank You
You should sustomize the classloader hierarchy to fit your needs, then.
